ext.description: Provides a button on editor title to run file and code lens 'Copy' and 'Run' for markdown code block.
runButton.title: Run this file
config.enableMarkdownCodeLens: Enable markdown code block code lens.
config.runnerMap: Runner map by language, available variables: {file}, {fileDir}, {fileBasename}, {fileBasenameNoExtension}, {fileExtname}, {pathSep}, {extTmpDir}
